ticket.title: UrlRewriter should call #to_param on the value given in :anchor
ticket.original-body:
UrlWriter#url_for method calls #to_param on the value given via the :anchor option:
@@@ url_for(:host => 'www.example.com', :controller => 'comments', :anchor => Comment.first) # => "http://www.example.com/comments#1" @@@
but UrlRewriter#rewrite_url does not:
@@@ comments_url(:anchor => Comment.first) # => "http://www.example.com/comments##<Comment:0x37cc100>" @@@
This patch makes #rewrite_url follow suit.
ticket.latest-body:
UrlWriter#url_for method calls #to_param on the value given via the :anchor option:
@@@ url_for(:host => 'www.example.com', :controller => 'comments', :anchor => Comment.first) # => "http://www.example.com/comments#1" @@@
but UrlRewriter#rewrite_url does not:
@@@ comments_url(:anchor => Comment.first) # => "http://www.example.com/comments##<Comment:0x37cc100>" @@@
This patch makes #rewrite_url follow suit.
ticket.original-body-html:
UrlWriter#url_for method calls #to_param on the value given via the :anchor option:


url_for(:host => 'www.example.com', :controller => 'comments', :anchor => Comment.first)
# => "http://www.example.com/comments#1"

but UrlRewriter#rewrite_url does not:


comments_url(:anchor => Comment.first)
# => "http://www.example.com/comments##<Comment:0x37cc100>"

This patch makes #rewrite_url follow suit.

url_for(:host => 'www.example.com', :controller => 'comments', :anchor => Comment.first)

version.body: Wups, let's not modify the options hash
version.body-html: Wups, let's not modify the options hash
version.title: UrlRewriter should call #to_param on the value given in :anchor

version.body:
(from [05b529ca57f75ce64540b9d34597e0c3bfe1fca7]) UrlRewriter#rewrite_url should call #to_param on the value given in :anchor option, just as #url_for does
[#2746 state:committed]
Signed-off-by: Jeremy Kemper <jeremy@bitsweat.net> http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/05b529ca57f75ce64540b9d34597e0c3bfe1fca7
